dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 8131 IH: Increasing Competition for Medical Residency Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Spartz introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Pension Funding Equity Act of 2004 to repeal the antitrust exemption applicable to graduate medical resident matching programs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Increasing Competition for Medical Residency Act.
Section 207 of the Pension Funding Equity Act of 2004 (15 U.S.C. 37B) is repealed.
This Act shall take effect on the March 18 that 1st occurs after the date of the enactment of this Act.
